[F][SB] shuttle buses are detoured because of New York City Transit Subway constructionÂ at McDonald Av and Kings Highway.

Detour is as follows:

TRACK REPLACEMENT
[7] No trains between Queensboro Plaza and 34 St-Hudson Yards

[E] [F] [N] [R] [S] [W] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service

[7] service operates between Main St and Queensboro Plaza.

[SB] Buses operate in two sections:
1. Queens between Queensboro Plaza and Vernon Blvd-Jackson Av.
2. Manhattan between Times Sq-42 St and 34 St-Hudson Yards.

Special [W] service operates between Whitehall St and Ditmars Blvd during the following times:
Saturday, 7 AM to 9 PM • Sunday, 9 AM to 7 PM

[S] 42 Street Shuttle service operates overnight.

• Transfer between [7] and [N] [W] trains at Queensboro Plaza.

Summary._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  [A] Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound trains run express from Hoyt Schermerhorn to Euclid Av

Description._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  [A] Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound trains run express from Hoyt Schermerhorn to Euclid Av

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE
[A] Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound trains run express from Hoyt Schermerhorn to Euclid Av

Nights, 10:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 20 - 23

Trains stop at Nostrand Av, Utica Av and Broadway Junction.

For service to Lafayette, Clinton-Washington, Franklin and Kingston-Throop Avs, take the [A] to
Utica Av and transfer to an Inwood-bound [A] local.

For service to Ralph Av and Rockaway Av, take the [A] to Broadway Junction and transfer to an
Inwood-bound [A] local.

For service to Liberty Av, Van Siclen Av and Shepherd Av, take the [A] to Euclid Av and transfer
to an Inwood-bound [A] local.

For service from these stations, take the [A] to Broadway Junction, Utica Av or Hoyt Schermerhorn
and transfer to an Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound [A].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at Nostrand Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

All times, until Friday May 18, 2018

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52-SBS, Q53-SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.
